bibdata.title: IEEE Technology Report on Wake-Up Radio: An Application, Market, and Technology Impact Analysis of Low-Power/Low-Latency 802.11 Wireless LAN Interfaces
IEEE Technology Report on Wake-Up Radio: An Application, Market, and Technology Impact Analysis of Low-Power/Low-Latency 802.11 Wireless LAN Interfaces
bibdata.docidentifier: 802.11ba Battery Life Improvement: IEEE Technology Report on Wake-Up Radio

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The IEEE Technology Report on Wake-Up Radio provides: An overview of IEEE 802.11ba Wake-Up Radio Near- and long-term use cases Market forecasts A comparison of Wake-Up Radio to other technologies A look at potential future developments IEEE Technology Report on Wake-Up Radio: An Application, Market, and Technology Impact Analysis of Low-Power/Low-Latency 802.11 Wireless LAN Interfaces is essential for every manufacturer developing devices and sensors for the Internet of Things. (PRE-SALE OFFER available. Please contact IEEE for a custom quote at onlinesupport@ieee.org).

The IEEE Technology Report on Wake-Up Radio provides: • •An introduction to IEEE 802.11ba Wake-Up Radio • Near- and long-term use cases • Market forecasts • A comparison of Wake-Up Radio to otherre technologies •A look at potential future developments IEEE Technology Report on Wake-Up Radio: An Application, Market, and Technology Impact Analysis of Low-Power/Low-Latency 802.11 Wireless LAN Interfaces is essential for every manufacturer developing devices and sensors for the Internet of Things.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
